extensionDescription.message: Shows an indicator on a popup panel along with the link address when the mouse cursor is over a link to a page you bookmarked or visited before.

__recentVisits_h2.message: How to handle recent visit times

__lastVisitedTwoDates_label.message: Show also the latest visit time

_customFormatDescription_html.message: Specify what to show on the popup panel with printf-style expansions (hover over the inputs to see available expansions). The popup panel is divided into three parts: prefix, URL, and postfix. Prefix and postfix are one-line and non-shrinkable, URL is (possibly) multi-line and shrinkable. Normally the URL should contain just %u.

__dateLimitsAndFormats_h2.message: Date time limits and formats in ascending order

_modeCornerNotes_html.message: The browser's native overlink panel should be disabled via userChrome.css, otherwise it will obscure the extension popup.

__modeHybrid_label.message: Above browser's native overlink panel (with no URL shown by default)

__longURLs_h2.message: Wrapping and clipping of long URLs

__maxLines_label.message: Maximum number of lines to show for URL:

_customCSSDescription_html.message: You can specify your own CSS rules on top of the built-in CSS (see the top of the file for important instructions). There are also some examples you can copy-paste from. You may also want to take a look at the structure of the overlay HTML (select View page source from the context menu).

_customCSSWarning_html.message: Note: After editing you need to click outside of the text area for the changes to be saved and take effect. Also, validity of the code is not checked in any way before injecting it to the overlay document.

__textSubstitutions_tooltip.message: Valid substitutions: %u %T %t %V %B %% (link URL, visit time, older visit time, visited indicator, bookmarked indicator, literal %) %+( %+) %-( %-) %+[ %+] %-[ %-] %+{ %+} %-{ %-} (conditional blocks: visited, not visited, bookmarked, not bookmarked, older visit time defined, older visit time not defined)

__timeSubstitutions_tooltip.message: Valid substitutions: %c %x %X %Y %y %m %b %a %d %H %k %I %l %p %P %z %M %S %% (see strftime(3)) %Ns %Nm %Nh %Nd %Nw %NM %Ny (seconds,minutes,hours,days,weeks,months,years ago, N is decimal places 0..9)
